topic.title: Cellar Spinach and Artichoke Dip
topic.shortdesc: Since you're already at The Cellar, don't miss out on their spinach and artichoke dip!

body.p: Served with toasted pita slices, the spinach and artichoke dip is a warm, comforting, and delicious! They are also gluten-free friendly, offering tortilla chips on the side in place of the pita slices.
